00094 inline bool listp(Cell* const c)
00095 {
00096   return nullp(c) || c->is_cons();

00221 inline Operation get_operation(std::string const opr)
00222 {
00223   if (opr == "+") {
00224     return add_opr;
00225   } else if (opr == "if") {
00226     return if_opr;
00227   } else if (opr == "ceiling") {
00228     return ceil_opr;
00229   } else if (opr == "-") {
00230     return minus_opr;
00231   } else if (opr == "*") {
00232     return multiply_opr;
00233   } else if (opr == "/") {
00234     return divide_opr;
00235   } else if (opr == "floor") {
00236     return floor_opr;
00237   } else if (opr == "quote") {
00238     return quote_opr;
00239   } else if (opr == "cons") {
00240     return cons_opr;
00241   } else if (opr == "car") {
00242     return car_opr;
00243   } else if (opr == "cdr") {
00244     return cdr_opr;
00245   } else if (opr == "nullp") {
00246     return nullp_opr;
00247   } else if (opr == "define") {
00248     return define_opr;
00249   } else if (opr == "<") {
00250     return lessthan_opr;
00251   } else if (opr == "not") {
00252     return not_opr;
00253   } else if (opr == "print") {
00254     return print_opr;
00255   } else if (opr == "eval") {
00256     return eval_opr;
00257   } else {
00258     return undefined_opr;
00259   }
00260 }

00267 inline Cell* get_defined(std::string str)
00268 {
00269   try {
00270     Cell* value = defined_map.at(str);
00271     return clone_cell(value);
00272   } catch (std::out_of_range&) {
00273     throw_error("Attempt to reference an undefined symbol \"" + str + "\"",
00274                 "cons.hpp::get_defined(string&)");
00275   }
00276 }

00284 inline std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& os, const Cell& c)

00295 inline int list_size(Cell* const c)
00296 {
00297   assert_cellnotnull(std::string("list_size(Cell*)"), std::string("Given c was null"), c);
00298 
00299   int size = 0;
00300   Cell* curr = c;
00301 
00302   while(!nullp(curr)) {
00303     ++size;
00304     if (!listp(curr)) {
00305       return size;
00306     } else {
00307       curr = cdr(curr);
00308     }
00309   }
00310 
00311   return size;
00312 }
